alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 11:43AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 1230 PM MST... At 1143 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Toltec, or 11 miles southeast of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Pockets of blowing dust may occur before the storms arrive. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Magma, San Tan Valley, Coolidge Airport, Olberg, Arizola, San Tan Mountain Park, Randolph, Valley Farms, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 176 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 167 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
